description: Operation to update shipping codes and shipping relevant addresses

SenderRelationId.description: The party that submits the SHP message.

OrderingPartyRelationId.description: The party on whose behalf the goods in the order had to be delivered.

Id.description:
The identification that the ordering party uses for the order. 
On the basis of this identification Modexpress checks whether the order exists for the ordering party (in Modexpress ERP/WMS) and if the update is possible. If so the order will be updated.
